entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add logging APIs to System.ClientModel #111046
  • AsnEncoder.WriteNamedBitList incorrectly encodes negative values #111044
    10.0.0
  • Self-assignment instead of delegate creation #111031
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 4 Regressions on 12/26/2024 9:20:31 PM #111039
  • [infra][arm64] OSX-based CI is timing out #111029
  • ArgumentException raising ArgumentNullException on ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #111028
  • JIT: Redundant bound check #111027
    Future

Closed

  • HashHelpers.FastMod might not return a valid modulo #111043
  • IDynamicInterfaceCastable and dynamic keyword #37812
  • ntml windows is work,linux not work #110371
  • NativeAOT: Usage of `static virtual` method from interface gets miscompiled as infinite loop #110932
  • [area-Tools-ILLink]: dotnet publish crashing when using PublishTrimmed option #109536
    10.0.0
  • Support for fast mixed mode call stack determination #12405
  • HttpHandlerDiagnosticListener may have issues with W3C tracecontext handling #37124
  • Add support for Arm64EC platform for COM based addins #96342
    Future
  • Creation of arrays with negative lengths? #110949
  • System.Net.Mail (smtp) option to save mailMessage #38115
  • Properly use SizeRef in MemoryCache once it is exposed in CoreClr #1427
  • Crash in ILC in the CI #110836
  • Hang during shutdown with Native AOT on IReferenceTrackerHost::ReleaseDisconnectedReferenceSources waiting for finalizers #109538
    9.0.x
  • Expand ILLink/ILC support for 'eliminate dead branches around typeof comparisons' to work on internal types too #110300
    10.0.0
  • Does Native AOT support exporting apis by serial number? #110979
  • ClientWebSocket ReceiveAsync infinite await #110496
  • NamedPipeServerStream: Provide support for WRITE_DAC #23554
  • Add FileAttributes.Executable as a possible FileAttribute #925
  • Investigate using unlinkat() when recursively deleting directories #29697
  • Allow choosing the character(s) to use for TextReader.NewLine #30082
  • FileSystemWatcher events out of order on OSX #30415
  • Write unit test to verify File.Move deletes source when overwrite is set to true #30822
  • Exception from CancellationTokenSource in Finalizer of FileSystemWatcher taking down whole application #31283
  • Inconsistent behavior in Directory.GetDirectories when using long path prefix (\\?\) #2286
  • strange message while running FileSystem.Watcher tests on MacOS #4709
  • Mac SDK: DirectoryInfo.EnumerateDirectories and DirectoryInfo.EnumerateFiles Method does not handle symbolic link very well #34363
  • System.IO.Directory.GetLogicalDrives() returns suprising results on Linux #32054
  • Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection test failure on mono #33894
  • While upgrading .net project from 6 to 8, got error #110405

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix PAL tests compilation on Alpine Linux #111045
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Baseline some more pri1 tests with NAOT #111042
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support writing base64 JSON segments #111041
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix reporting GC fields from base types #111040
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix LoaderAllocator of DynamicMethodTable #111038
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [IGNORE] Test localhost lookup #111035
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net
  • Remove HMFs from JIT helpers #111034
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser] remove EXPORT_EXCEPTION_HANDLING_HELPERS #111033
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [iOS] Fix CurrentCulture locale to be in specific format #111032
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Minimize use of `unsafe` context #111025
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Remove unsafe `bool` casts #111024
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Use `Unsafe.BitCast`to cast `Memory<T>` and `ReadOnlyMemory<T>` #111023
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Fix reporting GC fields from base types #111011
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not substitute return values of constrained calls #111030
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add missing X509CertificateLoader documentation #111036
    documentation, area-System.Security
  • Warn on message formatting failure instead of crash, and fix Native AOT MakeGenericType failure #110330
    linkable-framework, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq

Updated

  • JIT: Clean up `fgReplaceJumpTarget` call sites #111006
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Speeding up `Random.Shuffle` by batching #111015
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • JIT: Consolidate block pred iterator logic #111009
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • [no-merge][testing] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16.1 #110566
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Change RSA.LegalKeySizes for Apple platforms to return 8192 #110591
    area-System.Security
  • [JIT] Improve x86 HWIntrinsic containment #110736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add specialized FrozenSet implementations for byte and char #110842
    area-System.Collections, 10.0.0
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Unwrap NullableValue for diagnostics creation and add try/catch for formatting diagnostics #110229
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Clean up in Number.Formatting.cs #110955
    area-System.Numerics
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Revert "Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling." #110983
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] [llvm-aot] Fixed storing Vector3 into memory #111000
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix conflicting HttpClient configs #110999
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • [Apple mobile] Enable trimming on build machines to match ILLink features #110966
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Switch back to using stable wasmtime (29.0.0) #2907

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • deps.json missing local project reference #45686
  • OutputPath (`-o`) option should ensure trialing slash #45682

Closed

  • dotnet build and dotnet publish commands don't act on project build dependencies #45687

PullRequests

Created

  • Nit Compatiblity tools improvements #45685
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Don't require there to be a supported runtime pack runtime identifier for crossgen2 #45487
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45587
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Commands for generating shell completion scripts + statically-generated bash script #42416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Area-CLI, cli-ux
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: Extension await operator to address scoped ConfigureAwait #2649
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update simple-lambda-parameters-with-modifiers.md #8910

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • default(T?) is not disallowed when T has no struct constraint #76605
  • typeof(T?) is not disallowed when T is unconstrained #76603
  • CS9270 'InterceptsLocationAttribute(string, int, int)' is not supported when using Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder 8.0.x #76600
  • Foreaching over collections with compatible `IEnumerable<T>` implementations is disallowed by the compiler #76598
  • Nullability warning is missing on the lock statement #76597
  • converting from ulong to float then float to ulong #76595

Closed

  • MSBuildWorkspace.OpenSolutionAsync hangs indefinitely on 4.9.0+ in Windows 2022 Azure CI/CD #75967
    17.14 P1
  • No code completion for lambda parameter type if parameter has any attribute #76596
  • CSharpTestEmbeddedLanguageClassifier crashes with index out of range #76575
  • C# Extract Method refactoring failed if "Not all code paths return" #65496
    Backlog
  • "Quick Actions and Refactoring" puts the wrong items at the top. #76536

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove Edgio CDN usage to release/dev17.8 #76604
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge `features/GeneratedCodeAttributes` to main #76602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove Edgio CDN usage to release/dev17.10 #76599
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Propagate marked attributes to synthesized fields. #76567
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Continued Extract method cleanup (part 2) #76585
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Continued Extract method cleanup #76577
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Introduce local variable supporting target-type new syntax #76342
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Extract method cleanup #76550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update few completion tests #65490
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Language Feature Status.md: correct dictionary expressions entries #76574
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Prefix 'unmerged changes' with 'TODO' #62319
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Add more test scenarios for symbol completion after scoped #65747
    Area-IDE, Community, VSCode, Next
  • Add F1 test for scoped #64094
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Fix crash when classifying embedded test classifications #76576
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not dismiss extract method when a notification is shown to the user #76549
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure 'remove unnecessary using' shows up before 'convert to program-main style program' #76543
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use collection expressions #76534
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next

Updated

  • Reduce allocations in the C# lexer ctor #76544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during checksum creation. #76524
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Cleanup Extract method code (part 3) #76587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Allow users to define EmbeddedAttribute #76523
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rewrite unified settings test #76591
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • [main] Update dependencies to ensure coherency #76592
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Provide Access to RegisterLocationChangingHandler on the Router to allow centrally managed logic #59697
  • Perf regression: json #59696
  • Perf improvement: json, json #59695
  • Make it easier to secure inline scripting, which is used in all Blazor examples I've seen #59693
  • ASP.NET Core 9 sends response content for HTTP HEAD requests #59691
  • Perf regression: caching #59690
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #59689

Closed

  • Multipart body length limit 16384 exceeded in NET CORE #50252
    10.0-preview1
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef #59685
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, json_middleware #59674
  • ASP.NET Core Web API (Native AOT) project fail to serialize the object to JSON #59659

PullRequests

Created

  • Update OSX helix queue #59694
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Apply HeadersLengthLimit to preamble in MultipartReader #59646
    feature-http-abstractions, area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • More thorough support for retrieving OpenAPI routes in a case-sensitive manner #59568
    community-contribution, feature-openapi, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Font Size of span Element Not Rendering Correctly in Mobile Mode in .NET MAUI Blazor #26924
  • No Name is provided for "All color Delete button" in Categories and Tags screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Manage meta_Name Role Value. #26918
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • While applying Orientation newly created project is not visible in Projects screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Hambureger-Projects Options_Orientation. #26917
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • In New project screen Name, category and description sections are not accessible with talkback: A11y_.NET 9 template_Hambureger-Projects Options_Screen Reader. #26916
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Resize(Text size) Save button is getting truncated in Projects screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Resize. #26914
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • No Role is defined as buttons for work, personal, health, family and friends in tags section: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26913
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • No Name and Role is defined for Icons present in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26912
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Talkback is not announcing labels for Name, Description, Category edit fields in Project screen: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Labels or Instructions. #26911
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [MAUI]After rotating the Android emulator, the page content has extra blank space. #26910
  • Talkback Users are unable to access Pie chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Screen reader. #26909
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Time Picker Focus Unfocus is not working on Android #26908
  • Reflow(Display size) "Organize a Friends Get together list" item in task section is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Reflow. #26907
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Resize(Text size) in Projects section "Family and friends card text" is getting truncated: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Resize. #26906
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Tab Icon Color Changes Temporarily During Horizontal Scrolling Between Tabs #26905

Closed

  • SVG incorrectly rendered on splash (Android 15) #26925

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix problem with null VirtualView in HybridVewHandler on iOS #26928
    community ✨
  • Fixed HorizontalStackLayout Crashes Debugger on Negative Spacing #26927
    community ✨
  • Improve accessibility tags sample content template #26923
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app
  • Fix ListView.ScrollTo to Align SelectedItem with Center or End on Windows #26922
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve accessibility task overview sample content template #26921
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR3
  • Improve accessibility MainPage in sample content template #26920
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR3
  • Improve accessibility Add button in sample content template #26919
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for [Windows]ToolbarItem visibility until Page Disappearing #26915
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Android] Set FillViewport to true to MauiHorizontalScrollView #26904
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Windows] Tap Events Incorrectly passed Through Button - fix #26834
    platform/windows 🪟, p/0, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed IsEnabled Property not works on Tabs #26728
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ScrollToPosition.Center behavior in ScrollView on iOS and MacCatalyst #26825
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for TabbedPage more menu items color. #26876
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the exception when using CarouselView PeekAreaInsets Property in OnSizeAllocated method #26865
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for MenuFlyoutItems programmatically added to MenuFlyoutSubItems are not visible #26886
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Header and Footer template is not visible in CollectionView #26844
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Testing] Implement ScrollDownTo and ScrollUpTo methods in Appium #25601
    area-testing
  • [Testing] UITest to measure layout passes on a common scenario #25671
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for Application Crash When Updating ToolbarItem Icon and Navigating Between Shell Pages #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android / Windows] Fixed ListView.HasUnevenRows property run time changes #26882
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Improve accessibility sample content new project template #26903
    area-templates, a11y/sf-template-app, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fixed ListView items height are not proper in initial loading with HasUnevenRows set as True. #26841
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Simplify iOS ScrollView - improvement #26893
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Implementation of Customizable Search Button Color for SearchBar Across Platforms #26759
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fixed ImageButton not honoring Padding value. #26785
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-01-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement bulk update with SaveChanges #35401
    Backlog
  • JSON escape regression from EF Core 8 to 9 #35400
  • Test: investigate test failures after enabling Resolve_scoped_application_service #35398

Closed

  • Depend on the right version of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis #35187
  • ExecuteDeleteAsync fails to translate a single table navigation to parent table #35399
  • Generating a sql query #35387

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix tests by disabling provider caching. #35402
  • reverting previous commit (34129) to unblock the build #35397

Merged

  • [release/9.0-staging] Don't throw PendingModelChangesWarning when applying a specific migration #35353
    Servicing-approved
  • [TINY] Minor fixes to SQL baseline rewriter #35333

Updated

  • Add support for primitive collections to the compiled model #35370
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix to #35239 - EF9: SaveChanges() is significantly slower in .NET9 vs. .NET8 when using .ToJson() Mapping vs. PostgreSQL Legacy POCO mapping #35360
    Servicing-consider, 9.0.x
  • Fix to #35393 - GroupJoin in EF Core 9 Returns Null for Joined Entities #35395
  • Cosmos: Create shadow property for id if key cannot be used #35347
